text: The Learning Tree is a 1969 drama film. Learning Tree may also refer to: ==Schools== * Learning Tree School, a private school in Brunei *Learning Tree Academy, a school in Ghana *Learning Tree School, Whitfield County, Georgia, U.S. *Learning Tree School, Palm Desert, Coachella Valley, California, U.S. ==Other uses== *Learning Tree International, an American provider of IT skills-enhancement training * Project Learning Tree, a project from 1976 for environmental education in the U.S. *"The Learning Tree", track on 1995 album Generation 13 by Saga
title: Learning Tree (disambiguation)
